name: elephant lovey
notes:
**crochet elephant lovey pattern** 

this elephant lovey is the perfect cuddling companion for little ones! the pattern is beginner-friendly with lots of description and photos, but is also enjoyable for more experienced crocheters. i hope you enjoy making this one as much as i did! this pattern and others are available for free on my blog at www.loopsandlovecrochet.com. here you are purchasing an ad-free printable pdf version of the pattern.

finished size: when complete, this elephant lovey is about 11 inches tall from the top of head to the bottom of blanket. when the blanket is laid flat, it is about 17inches wide. note that your finished size might change with yarn, hook, and tension variations. 

materials: 
• worsted #4 weight yarn 
• 5mm hook for the lovey blanket and a 3.5mm hook for the amigurumi parts 
• poly-fil/stuffing 
• 10mm safety eyes 
• yarn needle for sewing on facial features, pieces together and weaving in ends

*you may make and sell any items made from this pattern, but please link back to this pattern or loops & love crochet. please do not share, reproduce or copy this pattern for any purpose. please do not re-publish photos as your own. thank you for respecting my rights as the designer and for supporting loops & love crochet.*

thank you and happy crocheting!
